src:
Berburu Merchandise Rider Idola di MotoGP Sepang, Malaysia 2019
04 Nov 2019, 15:35 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Menonton MotoGP langsung di sirkuit pasti juga mengundang para penggemar balap untuk mendukung para rider idolanya dengan cara mengenakan atribut-atribut rider terkait.
Jika menonton langsung di Sirkuit Sepang, Malaysia, Anda akan dimanjakan dengan barang-barang ini, Bolaneters. Di area mall sirkuit, terdapat banyak booth yang menjual atribut pebalap idola Anda.
Simak yang satu ini yuk, Bolaneters!
text:
Hunting Idol Rider Merchandise at MotoGP Sepang, Malaysia 2019
Nov 04 2019, 15:35 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Watching MotoGP directly on the circuit also invites racing fans to support their idol riders by wearing related riders' attributes.
If you watch live on the Sepang Circuit, Malaysia, you will be spoiled with these items, Bolaneters. In the circuit mall area, there are many booths that sell the attributes of your idol rider.
Check out this one, Bolaneters!
